name: api-testing
description: API testing with Newman and Postman collections

scripts.test: npm run test:get-invoices && npm run test:invoices-adding
scripts.test:continue: npm run test:get-invoices:continue & npm run test:invoices-adding:continue
scripts.test:reports: npm run test:get-invoices:report && npm run test:invoices-adding:report
scripts.test:reports:continue: npm run test:get-invoices:report:continue & npm run test:invoices-adding:report:continue
scripts.test:get-invoices:report: newman run "Get invoices.postman_collection.json" --environment testing-environment.postman_environment.json --environment login_details.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/get-invoices-report.html
scripts.test:get-invoices:report:continue: newman run "Get invoices.postman_collection.json" --environment testing-environment.postman_environment.json --environment login_details.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/get-invoices-report.html --suppress-exit-code
scripts.test:invoices-adding:report: newman run "Invoices adding.postman_collection.json" --environment testing-environment.postman_environment.json --environment login_details.json --globals invoice_details.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/invoices-adding-report.html
scripts.test:invoices-adding:report:continue: newman run "Invoices adding.postman_collection.json" --environment testing-environment.postman_environment.json --environment login_details.json --globals invoice_details.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/invoices-adding-report.html --suppress-exit-code
